name: Agriculture & Food 2022, 10th International Conference
content: Dear Colleague, It is a great pleasure and an honor to extend to you an invitation to attend the 10th anniversary edition of the "Agriculture and Food" conference, to be held on 16-19 August 2022 in Burgas, Bulgaria. "Agriculture and Food" is an international event held annually since 2013, organized in collaboration with the Bulgarian Academy of Sciences, Union of Scientists in Bulgaria and Science & Education Foundation. Despite the difficulties related to the pandemic, 173 participants from 29 countries have joined the event in 2021\. The conference offers a setting for experts from academia, industry and research institutes alike to discuss and share their findings and ideas in areas related to agriculture and food science. The results from the conference will be published in an online open-access journal indexed by AGRIS (FAO). Detailed information about the conference can be found at https://www.sciencebg.net/en/conferences/agriculture-and-food/?ref=brownwalker The conference will be held in Burgas, the fourth largest city in Bulgaria, located on the Black Sea Coast. Burgas is the cultural center of the region, and is famous for its gorgeous seafront park, pedestrianized center and beautiful beaches. We look forward to welcoming you at the meeting!
